ygData.subject: Arriving On Scene - Guns Blazing

Message-ID: <a.506106a.27462092@...>
Date: Fri, 17 Nov 2000 00:48:02 EST
Subject: Arriving On Scene - Guns Blazing
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Ares/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Double Punch/
Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:




Dark One landed, Hiss hopping out and Dark One transforming to biped mode.
He activated his comm. link to the base close to him.  "New base, this is 
Dark One of the Alliance.  The two groups of Predacons near you are enemies.  
Fall back and open fire ont hem, we will attack from behind."

Dark One raised his arm.  "ATTACK!  TAKE NO PRISONERS!"

Breakdown transformed into his artillery mode, firing off a 3 foot long 
explosive shell in a 10 foot radius of KitKat.

---

Pyro transformed into his tank mode, firing off three Fireballs at GoldenEye.

---

Hiss transformed into his gun mode, hovering in the air, firing off three 
x-ray blasts at Drill Bit (x-ray blasts damage internal stuff).

---

Scavenger transformed into his HUMV mode, firing off ten bullets from both of 
his moutned cannons, twenty bullets in all heading for KitKat.

---

Sixshot's cockpit opened, Ares leaping out.  The 'bot with the mythological 
deity namesake transformed in mid air, landing on the ground as a tank.

Sixshot pulled up, using his scanners to find targets.

---

Demon Wulf looked to his brothers, Flesh Ripper and Dark Claw.

Dark Claw transformed into his assault vehicle mode, arming his missile 
launchers.

---

Double Punch went into his stealth mode, his body cloaked.  He armed his 
energy-signature seeking missiles.

---

Injector and Bumblebee launched into the air, both holding stinger missile 
launchers in each hand.

---

Manterror powered up his weapons, taking a position behind a boulder, firing 
off a single ion disk at GoldenEye.
